statements: DELETE FROM follow_up_actions WHERE lead_status = 'Pending' AND follow_up_action = 'Email Follow-Up';
DELETE FROM follow_up_actions WHERE lead_id = 100 AND lead_status = 'Qualified';
DELETE FROM follow_up_actions WHERE lead_name = 'John Doe' OR follow_up_action = 'Send email';
DELETE FROM FollowUpActions WHERE action_type = 'Email' AND action_due_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM LeadCriteria WHERE lead_id = 123 AND criteria_description = 'High Priority';
DELETE FROM LeadCriteria WHERE lead_id = 101 AND criteria_id = 201;
DELETE FROM CriteriaActions WHERE criteria_id = 2 AND action_id = 4;
DELETE FROM Leads WHERE lead_name = 'John Doe';
